findings.description: The _mint function allows minting an unlimited number of tokens without any restriction.

findings.title: permit
findings.description: The permit function has been marked as a potential security risk.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Burn Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The _burn internal function has a vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected Swap Functions
findings.description: Multiple private swap functions (swapAndSendToFee, swapAndLiquify, swapTokensForEth, swapTokensForCake) are present without access control, allowing unauthorized users to manipulate token balances.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in skim function.

findings.title: Sync
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected initializer
findings.description: The 'initialize' function is declared as external and has no access modifier, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.
